mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.goout_type AS "gooutType", a.leave_type AS "leaveType", a.workingtime_type AS "workingtimeType", a.attendance_begin AS "attendanceBegin", a.attendance_end AS "attendanceEnd", a.days AS "days", a.address AS "address", a.cause AS "cause", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" ,b.name AS "createBy.name" ,c.name AS "createBy.office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.create_by = b.id
LEFT JOIN sys_office c ON b.office_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccm_worker_attendance( id, type, goout_type, leave_type, workingtime_type, attendance_begin, attendance_end, days, address, cause, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{gooutType}, #{leaveType}, #{workingtimeType}, #{attendanceBegin}, #{attendanceEnd}, #{days}, #{address}, #{cause}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ccm_worker_attendance SET goout_type = #{gooutType}, leave_type = #{leaveType}, workingtime_type = #{workingtimeType}, attendance_begin = #{attendanceBegin}, attendance_end = #{attendanceEnd}, days = #{days}, address = #{address}, cause = #{cause}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
